description: The one and only, real Decision Ball! "There are a lot of applications like this one!" - I hear your scream. Yes, it's right, but all of them use Pseudo-random numbers generated by CPU using complex mathematical formulas. Our Real Decision Ball generates true random numbers, analyzing radio waves around your phone. This is probably first time in your life when your future is in hands of a mystical power of randomness, not controlled by computer! Try it now and enjoy forever! Thanks for your response, especially Ally from Texas and Nazar from Baltimore - we're happy that our Ball helped you to find your happiness!
